body:
Either spec or compiler has a bug. Now they are not consistent. 
For the following one line file, assume it in the foo folder under $GOPATH/src:

> package _

"import foo" will cause compiling error.
But this file is valid by spec.

If compiler does right here, then in the https://golang.org/ref/spec#Package_clause section, the definition of PackageName should be changed.
